As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or experiences, but here are some examples of natural remedies that may help ease anxiety before going to bed:

1. Chamomile tea: Chamomile tea is a natural sedative that is believed to help calm the mind and reduce anxiety.

2. Lavender essential oil: Lavender is a natural calming agent that can help reduce anxiety and promote relaxation. You may use it by adding a few drops in a bath or diffuser, or using it as a pillow spray.

3. Meditation: A few minutes of meditation before bed may help calm the mind and ease anxiety. There are many apps and guided meditations available to help with this.

4. Warm bath: Taking a warm bath before bed can help ease tension in the body and promote relaxation.

5. Deep breathing exercises: Deep breathing exercises, such as abdominal breathing or square breathing, may help reduce anxiety and calm the mind.

6. Yoga: Certain yoga poses or sequences, especially those focused on relaxation, can help ease anxiety and promote relaxation.

7. Aromatherapy: Scents such as vanilla, jasmine, and bergamot may help promote relaxation and reduce anxiety. You may use these as candles, diffusers, or essential oils.

It is important to note that natural remedies may not work for everyone and that it is recommended to consult a healthcare professional if anxiety persists or interferes with daily life.
